lead_paragraph: An article in some editions on Friday about pitcher Kei Igawa’s toiling in the Yankees’ minor league system misstated his career statistics with the Yankees. His record is 2-4, not 3-3, and his earned run average is 6.75, not 4.46.
snippet: An article in some editions on Friday about pitcher Kei Igawa’s toiling in the Yankees’ minor league system misstated his career statistics with the Yankees. His record is 2-4, not 3-3, and his earned run average is 6.75, not 4.46.
